ovdesc.p: This table is used to define account tokens to be used in posting lines in the payments hub.
The accounts tokens refer to payment related accounts to be debited or credited as part of posting lines. The account could be the main debit, main credit, charges account, and P&L account.

desc.p: Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Concatenation of Primary Key Fields (CompanyID, AccountToken)
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created. Identify the Owning Bank.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Specifies the name of the account token to be used in the account token column in PostingLine Table.
